name: The Human Show
storyline:
The Human Show is a spiritual successor to "The Outsiders" from the first DreadX Collection as a conflicting, collaborative asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience. Work together with other contestants to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and deal with a variety of otherworldly creatures each ‘“episode.”

To keep the ratings up, the Game Master must not just torture contestants, but also collaborate with them while utilizing randomized trials and challenges every match. Plenty more are planned throughout Early Access to keep contestants expecting the unexpected.
